title: Belief Weight Index
description: Schema for storing cognitive cost or weight associated with beliefs in the belief_surface.json.

index.description: An object where keys are belief IDs (matching keys in belief_surface.json) and values are their weights.

weight.description: A numerical value representing the cognitive cost or importance of the belief (e.g., 0.0 to 1.0). Higher values indicate higher cost to change.

last_updated.description: Timestamp of when the weight was last calculated or updated.

calculation_metadata.description: Metadata about the last weight calculation process.
